reqsimile
Class Application

java.lang.Object
  reqsimile.Application
public class Application
extends java.lang.Object

Application is the starting point of the application, which creates the central classes and provides information about these (such as the application itself, the gui, database connections, etc.).

Since:
1.4.2
Author:
Johan Natt och Dag

Constructor Detail

Application

public Application()
Application constructor. A number of actions are taken:
  • Initializes data sources and data models for the table views.
  • Tries to opens latest project and read its settings
  • Tries to connect to databases based on project preferences
  • Initializes the gui
  • Updates the GUI based on read project preferences
  • Fetches requirements

openProject

public static void openProject()
Shows the file selection dialog to select a project to open. If a file is chosen, the project is opened.

getProjectPref

public static java.lang.String getProjectPref(java.lang.String section,
                                              java.lang.String property,
                                              java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns a preferences property of the currently loaded project.

Parameters:
section - The section in which the property resides in the INI file
property - The name of the property
defaultValue - The default value if the property cannot be fetched
Returns:
A String containing the property value

setProjectPref

Parameters:
section - The section in which the property resides in the INI files
property - The name of the property
value - The value to set
